name: 3D Printer GUI
short: Modern FDM control with dashboards, job control, sensors and maintenance.
description_md: A modern desktop GUI for FDM printers with tabs for **Dashboard**, **Controls**, **File Manager**, **Settings**, **Console**, **Sensors**, **Connection**, **Network**, **Maintenance**, and **Loop**.

name: Plasma Cutter GUI
short: THC control, arc voltage graph, safety and emergency stop.
description_md: Full **Plasma Cutter** interface featuring **Torch Height Control (THC)** and real‑time **Arc Voltage** graph.

name: ECU/TCU Driver Dashboard
short: Live gauges: RPM, gear, speed, temps, AFR, MAP, battery and fuel.

name: Smart Fridge Controller
short: MQTT/Bluetooth connectivity, setpoint control, compressor auto mode.
description_md: Refrigeration UI with **MQTT** and **Bluetooth**, **Setpoint** slider, **Compressor Auto**.

name: GSM Control Panel
short: USSD command interface with presets and live network metrics.
description_md: GSM console for **USSD** ops: presets, DCS selection, send/reply, signal readouts.

name: Solar/Inverter Dashboard
short: PV, load, grid, battery SoC with trend graphs and controls.
description_md: Energy dashboard with **PV**, **Load**, **Grid**, **Battery SoC** and trend graph.

name: Hybrid Gate Controller
short: Open/Close/Pedestrian controls, Wi‑Fi/GSM status, safety and limits.
description_md: Gate control GUI with **OPEN**, **STOP**, **CLOSE**, **PEDESTRIAN OPEN** and **Wi‑Fi/GSM** status.

name: Smart Battery Charger/Analyzer
short: Multi‑phase charging with health, ETA and live metrics.
description_md: Charging/analyzer with phases and health/ETA metrics.

name: Product WA‑09
short: Placeholder entry—image will be added once available.

name: Alarm System (Variant A)
short: Large ARM/DISARM controls with Wi‑Fi sync and status indicators.

name: Alarm System (Variant B)
short: Dashboard view with signal tiles and PANIC action.
description_md: Alarm dashboard with profiles and PANIC.

name: Shifter Bench Controls
short: Tabbed bench tool for CAN/CAN‑FD, profiles, safety and sensors.
description_md: Bench control UI for shifter testing.
